entry.summary:
RT Mailchain We are so excited to work with and learn from the brilliant developers across web3 Let's shape web3 communication for the whole world! 🌍🌟 #MailchainHackathon https://twitter.com/developer_dao/status/1641828319607017472
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): You have got a notification! 💌 Join us as we host a three-part workshop on mastering the art of sending Mailchain messages to users' web3 identities using the ultra-smooth @Mailchain_xyz SDK 💭⚒️ Sign up, now → https://lu.ma/enivle3i https://t.co/jmpMhkMlih

nicob.eth 📍 Bali: To all @developer_dao mini-hackathon participants! We heard you and we will add two more prizes to the 3k, so there is a higher chance of you winning something: 🥇 3000$ 🥈 750$ 🥉 500$ Happy hacking! We are looking forward to seeing your submissions!
